title: Lyrique No. 2: Lyrique on Musical Themes: Debussy, Poisson dor
description: A posthumous edition of a vertically oriented, rectangular, multicolored abstract woodblock print with mica and brass produced by the artist's son, Onchi Kunio (1920-2001).
dimensions: paper: H. 33 x W. 23 cm (13 x 9 1/16 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of Elizabeth and Neil Swinton
medium: Woodblock print; ink, color, mica, and brass on paper; with printed signature reading "onzi"
